Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey-black in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is elaborated with painted white band, edged with red-brown, on a buff-coloured ground, with traces of painted red-brown floral motifs (?) below, and section of an incised text above.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394151) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394151)
